channel.title: [Project Thread]AudacityPk || The New Way [525]
channel.description:
[i][center][B]AudacityPk[/B] [b] Revision: 525 Type Of Server: Pking
I believe in success I think all servers should be able to go somewhere. I believe all servers have the capability of becoming a 500+ person server. I believe this because if you have the mental drive to be the best. You will achieve the best.[/B]
[b]Team:[/b] [i][B][url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/mac+miller/]Mac Miller[/url][/B][/i]
[b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UQxho.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6v4ZW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6eXZb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o1fsi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TBtI4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2dbnmva.gif[/img]
[b]Features:[/b] Prayer fix ( switching prayers has effect delays to match Runescape , so you can do specials without players praying ) Bounty Hunter Scoreboards ( ACTUALLY WORKING ) Most damage gets drop ( with damage reseting perfect for luring in BH ) Target Cap, no more then 3 people can get 1 person as a target Full private chat without crashing. Full Magicks book ( all spells, not just barrage/maismic spells, but every single ancient spell ) Barrows degrade when dropped on death Perfect Switching [ unreleased and no dupes ] Perfect Potting (single/double dose) Deposit all in bank working Potion Mixing Corperal Beast Sound Effects for eating, attacking, pvp, music, pvm. Summoning, Beast Of Burden
[b]Small Fixes:[/b] No diagonal attacking/ attacking if standing on the same spot as somebody Veng saving ( after 30 seconds you can't cast another veng until your first one Fades and veng saves even if you logout/back in ) Magic immunity ( so you don't get refrozen right after the freeze fades ) Autocast small fix ( can't auto cast if you arent on ancients, not the gay emote it does if somebody forgets to switch to ancients ) When you have enough barrage runes, your spellbook will always have the spells Highlighted, doesn't randomly unhighlight like other z508s. 100% penalties, saves on logout, and shows the penalties on the bounty hunter interface even if you log in and out. Real max hit calculator ( tested with all the max hit calcs )
[b]About Old InterruptedPK[/b] I am now continuing the Project from InterruptedPK and hopefully make this a success.
Some good moments from InterruptedPK if anyone played.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXmWeuxpem4&feature=plcp
[b]Credits:[/b] Brkownz[/center]

item.title: [Project Thread]AudacityPk || The New Way [525]
item.dc:creator: @Mac_Ft Mac Ft
item.description:
@Mac_Ft wrote:

[i][center]AudacityPk
[b]
Revision: 525
Type Of Server: Pking

I believe in success I think all servers should be able to go somewhere. I believe all servers have the capability of becoming a 500+ person server. I believe this because if you have the mental drive to be the best. You will achieve the best.[/B]

Team:
Mac Miller

Media:




TBtI4.png765×506

Features:
Prayer fix ( switching prayers has effect delays to match Runescape , so you can do specials without players praying )
Bounty Hunter Scoreboards ( ACTUALLY WORKING )
Most damage gets drop ( with damage reseting perfect for luring in BH )
Target Cap, no more then 3 people can get 1 person as a target
Full private chat without crashing.
Full Magicks book ( all spells, not just barrage/maismic spells, but every single ancient spell )
Barrows degrade when dropped on death
Perfect Switching [ unreleased and no dupes ]
Perfect Potting (single/double dose)
Deposit all in bank working
Potion Mixing
Corperal Beast
Sound Effects for eating, attacking, pvp, music, pvm.
Summoning, Beast Of Burden

Small Fixes:
No diagonal attacking/ attacking if standing on the same spot as somebody
Veng saving ( after 30 seconds you can’t cast another veng until your first one Fades and veng saves even if you logout/back in )
Magic immunity ( so you don’t get refrozen right after the freeze fades )
Autocast small fix ( can’t auto cast if you arent on ancients, not the gay emote it does if somebody forgets to switch to ancients )
When you have enough barrage runes, your spellbook will always have the spells Highlighted, doesn’t randomly unhighlight like other z508s.
100% penalties, saves on logout, and shows the penalties on the bounty hunter interface even if you log in and out.
Real max hit calculator ( tested with all the max hit calcs )

About Old InterruptedPK
I am now continuing the Project from InterruptedPK and hopefully make this a success.

Some good moments from InterruptedPK if anyone played.

Credits:
Brkownz[/center]

Read full topic
